title: CES 2025: MSI showcases new performance and gaming laptops featuring Nvidia and AMD processors - The Hindu
summary:
CES 2025: MSI Unveils Cutting-Edge Gaming and Performance Laptops

Published on January 08, 2025 by The Hindu

At CES 2025, MSI has unveiled its new lineup of high-performance laptops powered by the latest Nvidia and AMD processors, showcasing advancements in gaming technology and AI capabilities.

  • MSI launches laptops featuring Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs and AMD Ryzen processors.
  • The Titan 18 HX Dragon Edition offers extreme gaming performance with bespoke design elements.
  • New Stealth series includes AI-powered laptops featuring AMD Ryzen AI 300 series CPUs.
  • The Titan series supports up to 270W of power with advanced OverBoost Ultra Technology.
  • MSI introduces the MSI AI Robot for hands-free laptop control with natural language processing.
“We’re excited to announce a diverse range of MSI groundbreaking new laptop lineup for our end users, ensuring their needs are met whether they’re looking for exceptional performance or AI-driven features,” said Eric Kuo, the Executive Vice President & NB BU GM of MSI.

MSI’s advancements at CES 2025 highlight its commitment to delivering powerful portable computing solutions that cater to both gamers and professionals.
newTitle: CES 2025: MSI Unveils Cutting-Edge Gaming and Performance Laptops

title: POCO onboards Akshay Kumar as brand ambassador ahead of X7 series launch - afaqs!
summary:
POCO Enlists Akshay Kumar as Brand Ambassador Ahead of X7 Series Launch

Publication Date: January 8, 2025

Source: Afaqs

POCO India has appointed Akshay Kumar as its brand ambassador, showcasing a commitment to technology and engaging the youth of India ahead of the upcoming POCO X7 series launch.

  • The POCO X7 series will launch on January 9 at 5:30 PM.
  • Akshay Kumar embodies POCO's 'Made of MAD' philosophy, aligning with the campaign 'Xceed Your Limits'.
  • The series features a 1.5K AMOLED 3D Curved Display and a segment-leading 6550mAh battery.
  • Both models run on Xiaomi HyperOS 2.0, offering next-gen AI features.
  • Strategic emphasis on innovation and pushing boundaries in technology.
“At POCO, we’ve always embraced bold choices... Akshay Kumar’s fearless persona makes him the perfect fit...” - Himanshu Tandon, country head, POCO India
“Partnering with POCO is an exciting new chapter for me... POCO’s fearless approach... truly resonate with my personality.” - Akshay Kumar

This partnership emphasizes POCO's strategic focus on innovation and aims to engage India's youth in redefining technological possibilities.
newTitle: POCO Enlists Akshay Kumar as Brand Ambassador Ahead of X7 Series Launch

title: Amazon launches Alexa-powered smart alarm clock Echo Spot in India - The Hindu
summary:
Amazon launches Alexa-powered smart alarm clock Echo Spot in India

Published: January 08, 2025 03:32 pm IST | Source: The Hindu

Amazon has launched the Echo Spot, an Alexa-powered smart alarm clock in India, featuring a customizable display and various audio capabilities.

  • Echo Spot has a 2.83 inch customizable touch screen and six different color themes.
  • It features a 1.73 inch front-firing speaker for playing music, podcasts, and audiobooks.
  • Users can set routines and automate tasks with voice commands through Alexa.
  • The device is priced at ₹8,999, with a special introductory offer of ₹6,449.
  • Available in Black and Blue, it includes features like ultrasound motion detection and the ability to make audio calls.
“Through our range of devices, we constantly strive to add more convenience and comfort to our customers’ daily lives,” said Parag Gupta, Director and Country Manager, Amazon Devices India.

This launch enhances Amazon's range of Alexa-enabled devices, aimed at improving user experience in smart homes.
newTitle: Amazon launches Alexa-powered smart alarm clock Echo Spot in India

title: OnePlus 13 series smartphones first to support Jio 5.5G network in India; offers over 1 Gbps download speed - The Indian Express
summary:
OnePlus 13 series smartphones first to support Jio 5.5G network in India; offers over 1 Gbps download speed

Publication Date: Tuesday

Source: Indian Express

OnePlus launched its new flagship smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, which are the first in India to support the Jio 5.5G network, facilitating download speeds exceeding 1 Gbps.

  • OnePlus 13 series is the first to incorporate Jio's upgraded Component Carrier Aggregation (3CC) 5G technology.
  • Speed demonstration showed a jump from 277.78 Mbps on regular 5G to 1,014.86 Mbps on Jio 5.5G.
  • 5.5G technology enables connections to multiple network cells simultaneously for enhanced performance.
  • No additional settings are needed for accessing the 5.5G network with compatible devices.
“Cutting-edge 5.5G technology allows your OnePlus 13 series device to connect to three different network cells, possibly even on different towers at the same time, for faster connectivity and better overall performance.” - James Paterson, Senior Global PR Manager, OnePlus

This advancement in mobile technology promises significantly faster download speeds and improved reliability for users in India.
newTitle: OnePlus 13 Series Launches with Jio 5.5G Support in India

title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale begins on January 13, Prime members to get 12-hour early access - Hindustan Times
summary:
Amazon Great Republic Day Sale Begins on January 13, Prime Members to Get 12-Hour Early Access

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale is set to commence on January 13, providing Prime members with an exclusive 12-hour early access to amazing discounts across various categories.

  • Deals on washing machines, saving up to 65%.
  • Smart TVs available at discounts up to 65%.
  • Refrigerators discounted by up to 65%.
  • Excellent promotions on laptops catering to various needs.

“The Amazon Great Republic Day Sale ensures significant savings for every shopper.”

title: Redmi 14C with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2, 50MP camera launched in India: Details here - Hindustan Times
summary:
Redmi 14C with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 and 50MP Camera Launched in India

Date: Jan 08, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Redmi 14C 5G is the latest entry-level smartphone launched by Xiaomi’s sub-brand, Redmi, in India. It features impressive specifications including a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor and a 50MP camera.

Key Points

  • Launched on January 8, 2025, with three variants: 4GB+64GB for ₹9,999, 4GB+128GB for ₹10,999, and 6GB+128GB for ₹11,999.
  • Available for purchase starting January 10 on platforms like Amazon and Flipkart.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, 5,160mAh battery with 18W fast charging support.
  • Dual rear camera setup with a 50MP main camera and an 8MP front camera.
  • 6.88-inch 120Hz display with 600 nits brightness, 240Hz touch sampling rate.
Redmi claims the battery should retain 80% of its capacity after 1,000 cycles, providing up to 22 hours of video playback.

The launch of the Redmi 14C underlines Xiaomi's commitment to providing advanced technology in budget smartphones, catering to a wider audience in India.
newTitle: Redmi 14C with Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 and 50MP Camera Launched in India

title: Amazon launches Alexa-enabled smart clock. Here’s all you need to know about Echo Spot - The Economic Times

Amazon has unveiled its latest product, the Echo Spot, which integrates features of the Alexa smart home product line. It is designed to offer users customizable aesthetics and a rich audio experience.

  • 2.83-inch customizable touchscreen display with vibrant color themes and clock faces.
  • 1.73-inch front-firing speaker for immersive audio experience.
  • Seamless integration with smart home devices and Alexa Routines for automation.

title: Amazon launches new Echo Spot with customisable compact display: Details - Business Standard
summary:
Amazon Launches New Echo Spot with Customisable Compact Display

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Tech News

The new Amazon Echo Spot is a compact and customisable smart alarm clock, designed to enhance user experience with its Alexa integration.

  • The Echo Spot features a 2.83-inch touch screen display with eight custom clock faces and multiple colour schemes.
  • Currently priced at Rs 8,999, with an introductory price of Rs 6,449 for a limited period.
  • Offers features such as custom alarms, snooze functionality, and a selection of new alarm sounds.
  • Functions as an audio device with a 1.73-inch speaker for music, podcasts, and audiobooks.
  • Can serve as a hub for compatible smart home devices and includes Ultrasound Motion Detection for automation.
“Alexa on the new Echo Spot enables other functions such as weather and temperature, displayed with illustrations.”

In conclusion, the Echo Spot combines convenience and technology, targeting users looking for a versatile alarm clock and smart home device.

title: Apple to improve AI news alerts feature after BBC complaint - The Hindu
summary:
Apple to Improve AI News Alerts Feature After BBC Complaint

Date: January 08, 2025 Source: Reuters

Apple has announced plans to improve its AI news alerts feature following complaints about inaccurate summaries, particularly highlighted by incidents involving incorrect news alerts.

  • The AI news alerts feature has faced criticism for summarizing news inaccurately, leading to misinformation being disseminated.
  • Specific examples include incorrect alerts regarding a murder suspect and false claims about tennis player Rafael Nadal.
  • Apple plans to roll out a software update in the coming weeks to clarify the summaries generated by Apple Intelligence.
  • The feature is currently in beta, available on iPhone 16, 15 Pro, 15 Pro Max, and some iPads and Macs.
  • Users are encouraged to report any concerns or inaccurate alerts they encounter.
“Apple is developing a software update to ‘further clarify’ these news alerts summaries generated by Apple Intelligence.”

In conclusion, Apple is taking steps to address the issues with its AI-powered news alerts in response to user feedback and complaints, emphasizing the importance of accurate information dissemination.
newTitle: Apple to Enhance AI News Alerts Following BBC Complaints

title: OnePlus launches 180 days phone replacement plan, available for OnePlus 13 - India Today
summary:
OnePlus Launches 180-Day Phone Replacement Plan for OnePlus 13 and 13R

Published On: Jan 8, 2025 | Source: India Today

OnePlus has announced a new phone replacement plan exclusively for its flagship OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones, applicable to purchases made before February 13, 2025.

  • The free replacement offer is valid within the first 180 days of purchase for hardware issues.
  • Customers must visit an authorized service center to confirm eligibility for a replacement device.
  • After the free period, users can opt for a paid protection plan at differing prices: Rs 2,599 for OnePlus 13 and Rs 2,299 for OnePlus 13R.
  • The OnePlus 13 is priced at Rs 69,999 and the OnePlus 13R at Rs 42,999, both available with bank discounts.
“We are proud to introduce this protection plan, further enhancing the user experience,” said Robin Liu, CEO of OnePlus India.

This new plan aims to provide better service and reliability for customers, reflecting OnePlus's confidence in their products.
newTitle: OnePlus Launches 180-Day Phone Replacement Plan for OnePlus 13 and 13R

summary:
Amazon launches Alexa-enabled Echo Spot in India for Rs 8,999

Amazon has introduced the Echo Spot in India, a compact, Alexa-enabled smart alarm clock priced at Rs 8,999. The device offers smart home integration, custom alarms, and media playback.

Key Features:

  • Compact design with a 2.83-inch touchscreen display.
  • Custom alarms with music options.
  • Smart home integration and control through Alexa.
  • Audio calls, household announcements, and privacy controls.
  • Available in Black and Blue.
“Customers can gently wake up to their favorite music, control Alexa-compatible smart lights and home appliances, and glance at the weather and their calendar–by giving voice commands to Alexa from the comfort of their bed.” - Parag Gupta, Director and Country Manager, Amazon Devices India

title: CES 2025: Panasonic's new flagship OLED TV has Amazon Fire TV built-in - Business Standard
summary:

Date: January 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The Panasonic Z95B Series OLED TV, launched at CES 2025, integrates Amazon Fire TV, Apple AirPlay, and advanced display technology for an enhanced viewing experience.

  • Available in 55-inch, 65-inch, and 77-inch sizes
  • Features Primary RGB Tandem display for brighter visuals
  • Powered by HCX Pro AI Processor MK II with 4K Remaster Engine
  • Supports Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos
  • Integrates live streaming with Amazon Fire TV for content discovery
  • Compatible with Apple AirPlay and Home
  • Enhanced for gaming with support for AMD FreeSync and NVIDIA G-SYNC
“The Z95B series introduces Calman and ISFccc calibration, delivering professional-grade tools to fine-tune colour accuracy and display performance.”

The Panasonic Z95B Series OLED TV aims to elevate home entertainment by integrating cutting-edge technology and streaming capabilities.

title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Pre-reserve open for Galaxy S25 series in India - Business Standard
summary:
Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Pre-reserve open for Galaxy S25 series in India

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Samsung News

Samsung has launched a pre-reserve program for its Galaxy S25 series, allowing customers in India to secure early access and get special benefits worth up to Rs 5,000.

  • Customers can pay a token amount of Rs 1,999 to pre-reserve any model of the Galaxy S25 series.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is set to be unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22.
  • Benefits include an e-voucher worth Rs 5,000 redeemable on Samsung’s platforms.
  • Pre-reserving customers will receive early access to the new devices, including exclusive color options.
  • The token amount will be adjusted against the final purchase price of the device.
“Customers who pre-reserve will be among the first to receive the new devices after launch.”

This initiative is aimed at enhancing customer engagement and ensuring early adopters of the Galaxy S25 series enjoy exclusive benefits and early product access.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Pre-reserve Program Launches in India

title: Where is the One UI 7 update for the Galaxy S23, S23+ and S23 Ultra? - SamMobile - Samsung news
summary:
Where is the One UI 7 update for the Galaxy S23, S23+ and S23 Ultra?

Publication Date: January 8th, 2025
Source: SamMobile

The Galaxy S23 series, after receiving its first major update, is anticipated to get the One UI 7 update around February 2025, following a quiet update period.

  • The Galaxy S23 series has only received One UI 6.0 and minor updates since launch.
  • Samsung launched a beta program for One UI 7 with only the Galaxy S24 series included.
  • Plans for the beta program for older models have reportedly been scrapped.
  • The S25 series is expected to be the first to receive the stable One UI 7.
  • No official timeline has been provided by Samsung for the rollout of the update.
“Stay tuned for updates on when the One UI 7 rollout begins.”

This update is highly anticipated by Galaxy S23 users who have been waiting for a substantial upgrade.

title: Dell unveils Apple-like rebrand in bid to make PCs cool again - ETBrandEquity
summary:
Dell unveils Apple-like rebrand in bid to make PCs cool again

Publication Date: January 8, 2025   |   Source: Bloomberg

Dell Technologies Inc. is rebranding its PCs to challenge the stagnation in sales and appeal to modern consumers by simplifying product names akin to Apple.

  • Dell is dropping older product names like “XPS” and “Inspiron”.
  • The new naming strategy will include three tiers: Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max.
  • Executives acknowledge the similarities to Apple's marketing naming conventions.
  • AI-optimized systems and the end of support for Windows 10 are expected to drive new purchases.
“Customers really prefer names that are easy to remember and easy to pronounce.” - Jeff Clarke, COO of Dell

This strategic shift aims to re-engage consumers and spur PC upgrades amid a decline in sales.
newTitle: Dell Reveals Apple-Inspired Rebranding to Revitalize PC Sales

title: GIGABYTE debuts enhanced cooling and more compact NVIDIA GeForce RTX™ 50 series graphics cards at CES 2025 - PR Newswire
summary:
GIGABYTE debuts enhanced cooling and more compact NVIDIA GeForce RTX™ 50 series graphics cards at CES 2025

Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: PRNewswire

GIGABYTE, the world's leading computer brand, announced the launch of NVIDIA GeForce RTX™ 50 Series graphics cards at CES, featuring enhanced cooling and reduced size for better game performance.

  • The new series includes models RTX™ 5090, 5090 D, 5080, 5070 Ti, and 5070.
  • Improved thermal performance by up to 10% and reduced overall card volume by up to 10%.
  • Introduces NVIDIA DLSS 4 for enhanced gaming and creative capabilities.
  • Upgraded cooling solutions like XTREME WATERFORCE and WINDFORCE for optimal performance.
  • Designed for compatibility with various gaming setups, including SFF-Ready cards.
“The Evolution of Ten design makes the cards 10% cooler and smaller.”

The enhanced features of GIGABYTE's RTX™ 50 Series cards make them a compelling choice for gamers and creators seeking high performance and efficiency.
newTitle: GIGABYTE Launches New Compact and Cooler NVIDIA GeForce RTX™ 50 Series at CES 2025

title: Samsung’s massive 115-inch mini-LED TV is its largest yet – but there’s an even bigger one at CES 2025 - TechRadar
summary:
Samsung’s massive 115-inch mini-LED TV is its largest yet – but there’s an even bigger one at CES 2025

Publication Date: N/A Source: TechRadar

The Samsung QN90F mini-LED, showcasing an impressive 115-inch display, is turning heads at CES 2025. However, it is not the largest mini-LED TV at the event, with the Hisense 116-inch model taking that title.

  • The Samsung QN90F is a successor to the highly regarded QN90D model, known for its performance in sports and gaming.
  • The Hisense 116” model features groundbreaking specs including a new RGB mini-LED backlight design and 10,000 nits brightness.
  • Both TVs emphasize superior viewing experiences with advanced technologies for brightness and glare reduction.
  • Pricing could be a significant factor, with Samsung typically positioned at a higher cost than competitors like Hisense.
With the addition of Glare Free tech to the new model, it should be a fantastic choice for viewing sports in bright rooms.

Choosing between these two impressive mini-LED TVs will be challenging, as ultra-big-screen TV buyers seek the best value and performance features.

Intel expands Core Ultra AI chips amidst market competition - TechTarget
summary:
Intel Expands Core Ultra AI Chips Amidst Market Competition

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: TechTarget

Intel has expanded its Core Ultra AI chips lineup, targeting gamers and graphic designers as it aims to counter competition from AMD and Qualcomm.

  • Introduction of Core Ultra 200HX and H series chips for mobile PCs.
  • Launch coincided with CES 2025 and follows previous releases for business PCs.
  • Market demand for AI PCs remains subdued; shipment dips reported by IDC.
  • Intel anticipates stronger positioning in the AI market with upcoming product launches.
"Without these new chips, they would have fallen far behind the others in the AI PC category," said Jack Gold, principal analyst at J. Gold Associates.

Intel's new processors are designed to enhance both gaming and enterprise computing capabilities as the company gears up for future competition.
newTitle: Intel Expands Core Ultra AI Chips Amidst Market Competition
